sentences.english: Her stomach trouble is much better than before.
sentences.chinese: 她的胃病比先前好多了。

sentences.english: How to treat transmissibility gastric disease?
There was silence as the elegant stomach specialist stood up.
sentences.chinese: 那位温文儒雅的胃病专家起立时室内一片寂静。

sentences.english: Symptoms include fever and muscle aches, often with other gastrointestinal symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 病症包括发烧和肌肉疼痛，常伴有其他肠胃病的症状。

sentences.english: Much attention must be paid in clinic to the cancerization trend of gastric disease with Spleen deficiency syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 临床上应高度重视脾虚气滞证胃病的癌变倾向。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the pathogenesis of portal hypertensive gastropathy .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨门静脉高压性胃病的发病机理。

sentences.english: The work appears in the journal Gastroenterology.
sentences.chinese: 此研究结果发布在《肠胃病学》期刊上。

sentences.english: In turn this leads to gastric mucosal injury and portal hypertensive gastropathy.
sentences.chinese: 反过来这又导致胃粘膜损伤和门脉高压性胃病。

sentences.english: The presence of gastric varices has no influence on portal hypertensive gastropathy .
sentences.chinese: 胃静脉曲张对门脉高压性胃病无影响。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between helicobacter pylori and portal hypertensive gastropathy .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨幽门螺杆菌与门脉高压性胃病的相关性。
焦急忧虑可以引起胃病。

sentences.english: That was how I got my gastric trouble.
sentences.chinese: 我的胃病就是这么得的。

sentences.english: The study was published in the July Gastroenterology.
sentences.chinese: 这项调查发表在四月的《肠胃病学》期刊上。

sentences.english: My stomach got worse when the schooner was becalmed.
sentences.chinese: 当双桅帆船因无风而抛锚停泊时我的胃病加重了。

sentences.english: Do you have anything for a bad stomach?
Sclerotherapy therefore leads to worsening of gastropathy.
sentences.chinese: 硬化疗法因此导致了胃病恶化。
